title: Little Niece
caption: My sister, Alex holds one of our other sister's twin babies, McKenna. She is 10 months old here.

title: Little Nephew
caption: This time Alex holding our Nephew, Mikah. Isn't he adorable? I think he may be plotting to take over the world like Stewie from Family Guy...

title: Mikah in the mirror
caption: Mikah and Alex looking through some very thick glass at a pair of lions at the Colorado Springs Zoo.

title: Beautiful afternoon in Spokane
caption: Saw this scene on a drive back from Lake Spokane the other day, and I had to stop and snap a couple shots.

title: Misty evergreen valley
caption: Taken during a light rainstorm during dusk

title: Spokane river through trees
caption: Shot at dusk near downtown Spokane

title: Flowers trail at dusk
caption: The flowers looked really interesting with the sun through them from a near head-on angle

title: Spring flowers on Spokane hill
caption: Shot from the trails up on South Hill overlooking the valley

title: Yellow flowers and trail
caption: Beautiful yellow flowers grow up against a hiking trail near Spokane

title: Yellow flowers and trail
caption: Beautiful yellow flowers grow up against a hiking trail near Spokane

title: South Hill overlook
caption: Shot at dusk from the top of South Hill in Spokane

title: Rock on the Hill
caption: I love shooting at dusk, when the angle of the sunlight can make ordinary scenes look amazing.

title: Spokane river through trees
caption: Shot at dusk near downtown Spokane
